Reviews.Title: Panny LUMIX FX75 ~ Top Value & Performance!
Reviews.Author: "BIG MARCUS"
Reviews.Content: After having owned a lesser model of the LUMIX line, I upgraded to this FX75 mainly for the 14mp & HD Video ability. Man what a fantastic package this camera is. It has a larger touch screen that is super simple to use! I have already taken MANY shots in various conditions and it has NOT dissapointed. And the VIDEO is great. Such a small package but a LARGE value! I am using a 16g SD card and it is perfect for a combination of tons of HQ pics and HD video. Also the microphone does a superb job picking up crisp sounds for playback and a wind-noise-canceler.Buy this camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic DMC-FX75S
Reviews.Author: Patricia Mitchell "Patricia"
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed with this camera. It does not zoom in enough for me. I have to fix EVERY pic I take with it. I love nature pics but cannot see in detail the effects I want. I bought this to replace a different Panasonic Lumix which was much better than this. This cost a lot more, but not worth it to meI just recently noticed it has what looks like dirt spots in the pics. I looked at the lens and do not see it, but it is there when I download the pics to my computer. I am looking into replacing this already

Reviews.Title: What a waste of money.
Reviews.Author: DWH
Reviews.Content: Camera does not have a view finder. The 3 inch LCD is of no use when the sun is at your back which makes it almost impossible to see what the photo you're wanting.

Reviews.Title: good pries, good qvolity
Reviews.Author: satisfaction
Reviews.Content: Panasonic DMC-FX75S 14.1MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3 inch LCD (Silver)good pries for  excellent quality

Reviews.Title: Nice but too many blury pics
Reviews.Author: Twintastic
Reviews.Content: Not sure if I'm using this camera right but I bought it to that I could just point and shoot.  Even on the smart photo capture feature the pics come out blurry.  It's ok.
